decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extensions hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (10011-01-BR, 10011-03-BR, 10011-04-BR, Location Plan, Planning, Design & Access Statement, Heritage Statement received 07/10/2013 and 10011-02-BR-B received 19/11/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank walls of the extension hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - No development shall commence until the existing vehicular access is closed and reinstated as public footway. Any works required to reinstate the footway shall be undertaken at the applicant's expense.
description: Conversion of garage into habitable space, erection of a single storey rear extension, rear roof extension including front roof lights and erection of a front boundary wall
